body:
Comment 7: 
Could we try and get a fix for this into Go 1.2?

The changes are rudimentary, I've also attached a (MSYS, not hg) diff describing the
changes.

I think the biggest thing is we need someone to commit them to the llvm repo, rebuild
the library, and submit an CL?
Attachments: 1. patch.diff (815 bytes)
